item.description:
The board game group is heading over to Lynn for the evening. Join our hostess Katie at Gulu-Gulu Cafe (the one in Lynn, not Salem) for an evening spent playing Trivial Pursit Millenium Edition.

Everyone will meet up at 7:00 for the game as well as drinks and something to eat at the cafe. If you haven't been to either Gulu-Gulu, it is a real treat with a wonderful atmosphere and great menu selections.

Parking is on street and is free after 5 p.m. Gulu-Gulu is also accessible by the commuter rail. For more information about the location, visit the cafe's website at www.gulu-gulu.com.

The contact number listed below is Katie's phone number and not that of the cafe.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Katie, she'll be the one with the game board in the cafe.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Trivial Pursuit at Gulu-Gulu in Lynn
